question: I never meant to cause you sorrow. I never meant to cause you pain.
On a dark desert highway, cool wind in my hair
You put the boom boom into my heart. You send my soul sky high when your lovin’ starts.
answer: Wake me up before you go go - Wham!

question: We are young (heartache to heartache)
answer: Love is a battlefield - Pat Benatar

question: I see trees of green, red roses too
answer: What a wonderful world - Louis Armstrong

question: We can dance if we want to, we can leave your friends behind
answer: The safety dance - Men without hats

question: It's 9 o’clock on a Saturday, the regular crowd shuffles in
(Turn around) every now and then I get a little bit lonely
answer: Total eclipse of the heart - Bonnie Tyler

question: Hear the drums echoing tonight, but she only hears whispers of some quiet conversation
At first I was afraid I was petrified, kept thinking I could never live without you by my side
